SEARCH

Class DescriptiveStatistics

java.lang.Object
DescriptiveStatistics
public class DescriptiveStatistics extends Object
The DescriptiveStatistics class provides methods for calculating descriptive statistics for a dataset. These include mean, median, standard deviation, sample size, population variance, and population standard deviation.
